Energy Tax Credit Direct Payment Act of 2020
Energy Tax Credit Direct Payment Act of 2020
To amend the American Recovery and Reinvestment Tax Act of 2009 to revive the section 1603 program allowing the Secretary of the Treasury to convert certain clean energy tax credits into cash grants.

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Select Revenue Measures.
